use_cases.case: The Anopheles gambiae mitochondrial (mtDNA) genome (NC_002084) was used to guide primer design for PCR amplification of Anopheles darlingi mtDNA.
The Anopheles gambiae mitochondrial (mtDNA) genome (NC_002084) was used as a reference genome for sequence assembly and annotation of the Anopheles darlingi mitochondrial genome.
The Anopheles gambiae mitochondrial (mtDNA) genome (NC_002084) was used in a comparison of genome content and structure among several anopheline species.
The Anopheles gambiae mitochondrial (mtDNA) genome (NC_002084) was included in a phylogenetic analysis of mtDNA sequences from several Diptera species.
The Anopheles gambiae mitochondrial (mtDNA) genome (NC_002084) was included in a molecular dating analysis to estimate the divergence of various Diptera species.
